name: Fillwords - Words search (English & Russian)
description:
Hello, it is the most famous game for search words "Fillwords - Word Search". Also known as the Hungarian crossword puzzle game is suitable for adults and children. Contains a huge number of levels with hidden words. Your task is to find all the words! Also, you can change the language of words to Russian and learn new language!

Capabilities:
- A large number of levels
- Levels in Russian and English languages!
- Perfectly categories of words
- Interesting words
- Different difficulty
- Hints

We wish you a pleasant game.
